activities: Equus Software licenses to and hosts software for private and publicly traded companies.  These companies may receive personal information which is then stored in the Equus software database.   Equus collects personal information through web inquires from individuals and companies located in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Equus will investigate any complaints about the use and disclosure of personal or sensitive information that are not in accordance with this policy. If Equus is unable to informally resolve any such matter to the individual’s reasonable satisfaction, it will participate in the dispute resolution procedures of panel established by the European Data Protection Authorities, as well as cooperate with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner so that disputes are resolved according to the Safe Harbor Principles.
